Package com.football.team.nice.controller

Class TeamController

java.lang.Object
com.football.team.nice.controller.TeamController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") @RestController @Validated public class TeamController extends Object
Manage Team REST endpoint

      @GetMapping("/teams") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page> getAllTeams(@RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="name") String filter, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page)
      Get the team list with pageable parameters
      Parameters:
      size - number returned elements
      filter - column to filter the list with : default sort by team name
      page - page number
      Returns:
      paginated team list
